Class DevicePropertiesTableImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.context.device.properties.table.impl.DevicePropertiesTableImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DevicePropertiesTableSpec
public class DevicePropertiesTableImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DevicePropertiesTableSpec

The device properties table implementation is an ApAM component to map core devices end users properties.

June 7, 2013
Version:
1.0.0

Cédric Gérard

notifyChanges

public NotificationMsg notifyChanges(java.lang.String objectId,
                                     java.lang.String userId,
                                     java.lang.String propertyName,
                                     java.lang.String propertyValue)
This method uses the ApAM message model. Each call produce a ContactNotificationMsg object and notifies ApAM that a new message has been released.

Parameters:
objectId - the object identifier
userId - the user identifier
propertyName - the name of the property that changed
propertyValue - the new property value
Returns:
nothing, it just notifies ApAM that a new message has been posted.
